title: Authors and Citation
text: Eric Nantz. Author, maintainer. John Spurlock. Contributor.            Author OP3 project

title: Authors and Citation
text: Nantz E (2024). op3r: R Interface OP3 API. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://rpodcast.github.io/op3r/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {op3r: R Interface to the OP3 API},   author = {Eric Nantz},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://rpodcast.github.io/op3r/}, }

what: R Interface to the OP3 API
title: R Interface to the OP3 API
text: op3r R package providing tidy interface Open Prefix Project (OP3) API created John Spurlock available https://op3.dev Open Podcast Prefix Project (OP3) free open-source podcast prefix analytics service committed open data listener privacy.

title: R Interface to the OP3 API
text: can install development version op3r GitHub :

title: R Interface to the OP3 API
text: API endpoints supported op3r require API token. obtain set, create free developer account https://op3.dev/api/docs save token environment variables called OP3_API_TOKEN within project-level default user-directory .Renviron file.

title: R Interface to the OP3 API
text: Save OP3 API token project-level user-level .Renviron file using following template: can check whether authentication working correctly op3_token_isset() function:

title: R Interface to the OP3 API
Obtain OP3 API token — get_op3_token
text: Obtain OP3 API token .Renviron file, either stored current directory user's home directory.

title: Obtain OP3 API token — get_op3_token
Obtain OP3 API token — get_op3_token
text: list API token

what: Get monthly and weekly show download counts — op3_downloads_show
title: Get monthly and weekly show download counts — op3_downloads_show
text: op3_downloads_show() obtains number monthly downloads average weekly downloads last four weeks (excludes bots)

title: Get monthly and weekly show download counts — op3_downloads_show
Get monthly and weekly show download counts — op3_downloads_show
text: show_id One character strings OP3 show UUID values nest_downloads Boolean create list column weekly download metrics expand data frame one row per week download metrics. Default TRUE.

title: Get monthly and weekly show download counts — op3_downloads_show
text: tibble data frame following columns: days: Number days time window monthlyDownloads: Number downloads month weeklyAvgDownloads: Average number downloads per week month numWeeks: Number weeks time window download_data: Nested data frame download numbers per week (nest_downloads TRUE) weekNumber: Week number time window (nest_downloads FALSE) weeklyDownloads: Number downloads weekNumber (nest_downloads FALSE)

title: Get monthly and weekly show download counts — op3_downloads_show
code: if (FALSE) { # op3r::op3_token_isset() # Requires API token  op3_downloads_show(show_id = "a18389b8a52d4112a782b32f40f73df6") }

what: Get log record metadata for OP3 service — op3_hits
title: Get log record metadata for OP3 service — op3_hits
text: op3_hits() obtains lowest-level log records every prefix redirect processed OP3 service.

title: Get log record metadata for OP3 service — op3_hits
code: op3_hits(   format = "json",   limit = 100,   desc = TRUE,   start = NULL,   start_inclusive = TRUE,   end = NULL,   url = NULL,   hashed_ip_address = NULL )

title: Get log record metadata for OP3 service — op3_hits
text: format result output format returned API endpoint. Possible values json (object-based) json-(array-based) formats. limit Integer maximum number episodes return. maximum limit supported endpoint 1000. Default 100. desc Boolean return results time-descending order. FALSE, results returned time-ascending order. Default TRUE. start Optional date date-time object filter results starting supplied value. object must class Date. Default NULL. start_inclusive Boolean consider start date date-time inclusive results. FALSE, start value considered exclusive. Default TRUE. end Optional date date-time object filter results ending supplied value. object must class Date. Default NULL. url Optional string fulter results specific URL providing redirect. Default NULL. hashed_ip_address Optional string filter results specific IP address secure hash. Default NULL.

title: Get log record metadata for OP3 service — op3_hits
text: Atibble data frame json format, otherwise nested list json-format.

title: Get log record metadata for OP3 service — op3_hits
code: if (FALSE) { # op3r::op3_token_isset() # Requires API token  op3_hits(limit = 10) }

title: Get podcast show information — op3_show
text: op3_show() obtains show-level information given podcast using OP3.

title: Get podcast show information — op3_show
Get podcast show information — op3_show
text: show_id String representing OP3 show UUID, podcast GUID, podcast RSS feed URL. episodes Boolean return episode-level metadata along show-level information. Default FALSE.

title: Get podcast show information — op3_show
text: tibble data frame following columns: showUuid: Podcast OP3 UUID title:  Podcast title podcastGuid: Podcast GUID statsPageUrl: URL OP3 statistics web page podcast episodes_id: Episode ID (episodes TRUE) episodes_title: Episode title (episodes TRUE)

title: Get podcast show information — op3_show
code: if (FALSE) { # op3r::op3_token_isset() # Requires API token  op3_show(show_id = "bb28afcc-137e-5c66-b231-4ffad7979b44") }

what: Detect if OP3 API token is defined — op3_token_isset
title: Detect if OP3 API token is defined — op3_token_isset
text: Detect OP3 API token defined

title: Detect if OP3 API token is defined — op3_token_isset
Detect if OP3 API token is defined — op3_token_isset
text: boolean, TRUE 'OP3_API_TOKEN` defined current R session.

what: Get top apps by share of downloads — op3_top_apps
title: Get top apps by share of downloads — op3_top_apps
text: op3_top_apps() obtains global shares application downloads last thirty days categorized application

title: Get top apps by share of downloads — op3_top_apps
Get top apps by share of downloads — op3_top_apps
text: device_name Optional string specific device ID constrain results.

title: Get top apps by share of downloads — op3_top_apps
text: tibble data frame following columns: app_name: Device name value: Percentage download share min_date: Oldest date data range max_date: Newest date data range

title: Get top apps by share of downloads — op3_top_apps
code: if (FALSE) { # op3r::op3_token_isset() # Requires API token  op3_top_apps() }

what: Get download numbers by application for a show — op3_top_show_apps
title: Get download numbers by application for a show — op3_top_show_apps
text: op3_top_show_apps() obtains download numbers individual podcast applications last three calendar months specific show.

title: Get download numbers by application for a show — op3_top_show_apps
Get download numbers by application for a show — op3_top_show_apps
text: show_id String representing OP3 show UUID, podcast GUID, podcast RSS feed URL.

title: Get download numbers by application for a show — op3_top_show_apps
text: tibble data frame following columns: show_uuid: OP3 show UUID app_name: Name podcast application value: Number downloads last three calendar months

title: Get download numbers by application for a show — op3_top_show_apps
code: if (FALSE) { # op3r::op3_token_isset() # Requires API token  op3_top_show_apps(show_id = "bb28afcc-137e-5c66-b231-4ffad7979b44") }

what: Get recent episodes with transcripts — op3_transcripts
title: Get recent episodes with transcripts — op3_transcripts
text: op3_transcripts() obtains recent episodes podcasts using OP3 containing transcripts along daily download numbers.

title: Get recent episodes with transcripts — op3_transcripts
Get recent episodes with transcripts — op3_transcripts
text: limit Integer maximum number episodes return. maximum limit supported 100. nest_downloads Boolean create list column daily download metrics expand data frame one row per day download metrics. Default TRUE.

title: Get recent episodes with transcripts — op3_transcripts
text: tibble data frame following columns: asof: Timestamp pubdate: Episode publish timestamp podcastGuid: Podcast GUID episodeItemGuid: Episode GUID hasTranscripts: Boolean indicating episode transcript dailyDownloads: List episode download numbers date (nest_downloads TRUE) date: Date download number (nest_downloads FALSE) n_downloads: Number downloads date (nest_downloads FALSE)

title: op3r (development version)
text: Initial CRAN submission.
